title: Charitable reproof a sermon preached at the Church of St. Mary-le-Bow to the Societies for Reformation of Manners, the 25th of March, 1700 / by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: "Published at the request of the said societies."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
